Sentencas: Direct carbon fuel cells based on solid oxide electrolyte (SO-DCFCs) suffer from the poor contact between the anode surface and the carbon particles.
Titulo: Investigation of the anode reactions in SO-DCFCs fueled by Sn-C mixture fuels

Sentencas: By mixing the carbon fuel with Sn, the contact can be enhanced due to the fluidity of liquid Sn at the high operation temperature.
Titulo: Investigation of the anode reactions in SO-DCFCs fueled by Sn-C mixture fuels

Sentencas: However, Sn is an active fuel and can be oxidized electrochemically.
Titulo: Investigation of the anode reactions in SO-DCFCs fueled by Sn-C mixture fuels

Sentencas: In this study, the effect of Sn on the performance of SO-DCFCs was investigated.
Titulo: Investigation of the anode reactions in SO-DCFCs fueled by Sn-C mixture fuels

Sentencas: Four carbon fuels, including a graphite (GC), an anthracite coal (PYQ), a lignite (PCF) and an activated carbon (PAC), were mixed with Sn powder respectively and used as anode fuels.
Titulo: Investigation of the anode reactions in SO-DCFCs fueled by Sn-C mixture fuels

Sentencas: The electrochemical performances, including the polarization performance and the long-term durability, were measured at 1023-1123 K in Sn-only, Sn-C mixture and C-only mode.
Titulo: Investigation of the anode reactions in SO-DCFCs fueled by Sn-C mixture fuels

Sentencas: The morphology and elemental composition of the anodes were analyzed by SEM-EDX after the durability tests.
Titulo: Investigation of the anode reactions in SO-DCFCs fueled by Sn-C mixture fuels

Sentencas: The results show that pure Sn fueled cell degraded rapidly due to the accumulation of SnO2 in the anode.
Titulo: Investigation of the anode reactions in SO-DCFCs fueled by Sn-C mixture fuels

Sentencas: Sn-GC, Sn-PYQ and Sn-PCF displayed similar open circuit voltages (OCVs) and maximum power densities (MPDs) with pure Sn.
Titulo: Investigation of the anode reactions in SO-DCFCs fueled by Sn-C mixture fuels

Sentencas: For Sn-PAC, the OCV was as high as 1.0 V and the MPD (150.8 mW/cm(2)) was much higher than the other Sn-C mixtures.
Titulo: Investigation of the anode reactions in SO-DCFCs fueled by Sn-C mixture fuels

Sentencas: The SEM-EDX results show that SnO2 accumulation on the anode surface was the key factor affecting the cell performance.
Titulo: Investigation of the anode reactions in SO-DCFCs fueled by Sn-C mixture fuels

Sentencas: For Sn-GC, Sn-PYQ and Sn-PCF fueled cells, SnO2 reduction rate was lower than the electro-oxidation rate of Sn, leading to SnO2 accumulation on the anode surface.
Titulo: Investigation of the anode reactions in SO-DCFCs fueled by Sn-C mixture fuels

Sentencas: The cell performance was mainly governed by electro-oxidation of Sn.
Titulo: Investigation of the anode reactions in SO-DCFCs fueled by Sn-C mixture fuels

Sentencas: While for Sn-PAC fueled cell, PAC reduced SnO2 much faster than the other fuels and no SnO2 was detected in the anode pores due to its high BET surface area.
Titulo: Investigation of the anode reactions in SO-DCFCs fueled by Sn-C mixture fuels

Sentencas: The main anode reactions were CO electro-oxidation and C-CO2 gasification.
Titulo: Investigation of the anode reactions in SO-DCFCs fueled by Sn-C mixture fuels
Investigation of the anode reactions in SO-DCFCs fueled by Sn-C mixture fuels
